document.heading: Digital Audio Radio Satellite Service Companies Tax Exemption Act of 1999

history.narrative: Law 13-75, the “Digital Audio Radio Satellite Service Companies Tax Exemption Act of 1999,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-262, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 5, 1999, and November 2, 1999, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on November 18, 1999, it was assigned Act No. 13-192 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-75 became effective on April 5, 2000.
